error_dm: You can use this commands only in guild text channels
error_not_in_vc: You must be in a voice channel to use this command
reload_desc: Reload bot config. Some changes will be applied only after restart
invite_desc: Invite this bot to your server
invite_emb: Invite this bot to your server
help-desc:
Just join VC from Desktop/Web client, type `/activity` and choose one from the list
Then press `Enter` and click link-button - you've started an activity in your VC. 

To add bot to your server - use command `/invite-link`
